apps/desktop/src/workspace/views/dashboa.description: Contains the canonical filter pattern implementation (lines 279-437, 1064-1122). Uses FilterType = 'all' | 'category' | 'tag' | 'person' | 'place' with filterType and selectedFilters state. currentFilterOptions memo switches on filterType. Filter UI at lines 1064-1122 shows type buttons and filter chips.

apps/desktop/src/App.tsx.description: Detail panel state variables are defined around lines 1260-1330. The new detailNotesFilter state was added at line 1268 to support multi-select item types (event, task, note, habit, tracker). Uses array type for multi-select pattern following dashboard.tsx selectedFilters pattern.

packages/shared/src/models.ts.description: CalendarEvent type definition at line 198-231. CalendarEventKind = 'event' | 'task' | 'log' | 'episode' at line 88. Currently uses single 'kind' field - needs 'kinds' array for multi-select support.

apps/desktop/src/workspace/views/ticktic.description: Task filtering pattern: Uses filterType ('all'|'category'|'tag'|'person'|'place') and selectedFilters array. When filterType is not 'all' and selectedFilters has values, tasks are filtered in useMemo using switch statement. Same pattern as dashboard.tsx lines 413-424.

./src/App.tsx.description: Multi-select item types implemented at lines 6687-6717. Toggle buttons for EVENT/TASK allow items to have multiple kinds simultaneously. Uses selectedEvent.kinds array with backward compat to selectedEvent.kind.
